entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Papineau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:47 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -6.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gatineau Airport 08:48 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -6.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -7.2°C
Wind: E 18 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 before morning. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 8 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 8 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
